info.title: Clerk Tools User Authorization
info.description:
This service provides endpoints for obtaining and refreshing OAuth2-style tokens.

### Typical Usage Flow (Web or Mobile Application)
1. Call **`/api/auth/token`** with **Basic Authentication** (username/password or client credentials) to generate an **access_token** and a **refresh_token**.
2. Use the **access_token** (JWT) in requests to access secure APIs:
   ```
   Authorization: Bearer {access_token}
   ```
3. When the access token expires, you can either:
   - Generate a new token again with **username/password** using `/api/auth/token`, OR
   - Continue the session without username/password by using the **refresh_token** at `/api/auth/refresh`.

### Refresh Behavior
- A new access token is generated.
- Both a new access token and a new refresh token are returned.
- The previous **refresh_token** expires.

tags.name: Authentication Service
tags.description: Endpoints for generating and refreshing access tokens.

post.description:
Authenticate using **Basic Authentication** with username/password or client credentials.

This endpoint is typically used by a web or mobile application at login when the user first enters their credentials. Returns both an **access_token** and a **refresh_token**.

**Header example**:
```
Authorization: Basic base64(username:password)
```

Obtain a new access token using a **refresh_token** instead of username/password.

This endpoint is typically used by web or mobile applications to continue the user session after login, without prompting for credentials again.

**Header example**:
```
Authorization: Bearer {refresh_token}
```

**Refresh behavior:**
- A new access token is generated.
- Both a new access token and a new refresh token are returned.
- The previous **refresh_token** expires.

access_token.description: JWT access token used to access secure Clerk Tools APIs.

expires_in.description: Number of seconds until the access token expires.

refresh_token.description: Refresh token used to obtain a new access token. Previous refresh_token expires when a new one is issued.

basicAuth.description: Basic Authentication using username and password.

bearerAuth.description: Use the **refresh_token** as the Bearer credential on `/api/auth/refresh`.
